storyInfo: The connection between Lucilla and a Church of the Deep cultist has made her the target of strict Sea Patrol monitoring, but nobody expects what she does next.

attributes.content: Attention, all units. Lucilla is currently aiding a Church of the Deep cultist escape.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: She is to be regarded as an additional suspect in our pursuit.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Her actions are proof enough. She intends to betray Ã†gir.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Twelve hours ago, Sea Patrol Station
You're saying that Anya schemed to lure the Seaborn occupying the volcanic power station to the city? Pft, what a sick joke. You're even calling her a cultist.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: This is no joking matter. The stolen Seaborn attractant pheromones, the timing of her going out to the sea... everything points towards Anya and her mentor. I hope you will cooperate with our investigation.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Our city moved so it could avoid Seaborn, right? You mean she tried to attract the Seaborn that weren't even chasing us? *sigh* Why would she even do that?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: What is she doing now? Where is she?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Her vital signs were already gone by the time of the incident.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: She's... dead?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Sitting in the mezzanine of the transparent dome and quietly admiring the scenery outside, one may have the illusion of floating in the middle of the sea, surrounded by clear water.
*phew* I'm feeling a bit dizzy.
attributes.name: Anya

attributes.content: Want some neuro-stabilizers? I prepped some just for you. They inhibit the vertigo you get from a fear of heights. If you can't handle the bitterness, I also haveâ€”
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Lucilla plucks some sweetener from her pocket with an exaggerated flourish, making Anya laugh.
I heard your bioprobe got destroyed by the Seaborn again this morning, so I figured you'd be here after cleaning up that mess.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Yeah. Ran into a few of them while out reinstalling it.
attributes.name: Anya

attributes.content: Again...? How close were they this time?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: This has been happening more and more often over the past six months, hasn't it? Every time you come here, you look absolutely exhausted.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Are you asleep?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Lucilla cranes her head over to have a look. Anya's head is resting on her shoulder as she quietly looks out at the clear waters outside the dome.
Tell me, Anya. Is the sea out there really that terrifying?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: I... I work in the spot closest to the sea every day, but I've never seen them before.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: I only ever see the unending streams of legionnaires heading out, and you and your mentor doing your best to restore the ocean's ecology.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Sometimes, I think... What's the frontline really like? What price did you pay for the peace I see inside the dome?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Anya softly murmurs something. Lucilla can't help but lean over and look her in the eye.
Lucilla leaves the Sea Patrol station, still in a daze. She tries helplessly to contact Anya, over and over, but there is no response.
What's this...?!
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.text: I am sure you have also gotten involved in the Sea Patrol's investigation, and they told you that Anya attempted to provoke the Seaborn from the power station into chasing our retreating city.
\nI have something important to tell you about her true cause of death.
Please come meet me immediately after receiving this message, for her sake.
\nAs her friend, you wouldn't ignore this, would you?

attributes.content: (Anya's mentor... He was with her that day!)
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: *pant*â€”*pant*â€”
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Did we manage to shake them off?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: *cough* At least I can't see any Sea Patrol uniforms...
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: You are really... All I said was that they were shadowing me, and you just took off... Aren't you scared of them branding you as my accomplice?
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: I just want to know the truth. Can't do that if you're arrested.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Tell me, is Anya really...?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: She sacrificed herself, yes.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: We promised to see an exhibition together, but she suddenly stood me up to go out to sea with you. What did you two discover? Is she the reason why the Sea Patrol are tailing you?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: They suspect I am a cultist of the Church of the Deep, but they have no proof.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Well, are you?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: I am not fond of that label, and I do not believe in any doctrines as such. I merely believe what I believe.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: ...So, that's a 'yes.' What about... what about Anya?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Anya. She was my greatest student, whether in academia, or in my approach towards the Seaborn. Did she not tell you anything?
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: They've stopped running. Keep your distance; let them think they shook us off.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: I've identified the woman Pappus contacted: Lucilla, a dome maintenance worker with the Academy of Technology's Institute of Facility Management.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: I know her. We did our own investigation into her not too long ago. She said that even if she herself fell in with the Church, Anya would never fall.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Tap into the closest camera. Let's hear what they're talking about.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: You're lying. You said you wanted to tell me the truth, but you're saying the same thing the Sea Patrol didâ€”
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: 'She's a cultist; she led the Seaborn to the city.' Like her death was no surprise. Like she got what she deserved.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: So where's the difference? Wasn't there supposed to be some kind of hidden truth?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Calm down, Lucilla. Lower your voice.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: I am calm. I'm the calmest person here in this ridiculous... whatever's-going-on!
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: I sought you out because it must be you who realizes her truest desire. Only you can do this.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: I want you to take Anya's remains from the reef I concealed them in, and return them to the city. Once you see them, you will understand everything.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Her... remains?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Alright, it's safer to discuss it in here.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: I know it's a shock, having to hear your close friend be referred to as 'remains.' But you must understand the heroic sacrifice she made to see her wish come true.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: You're saying this was all her own choice?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: The conclusion she and I arrived at withstood countless refutations and proofs. Humanity is but a link in the ocean's food chain. If we do not wish to be at its lowest rung, we must evolve.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: And the very peak of evolution, the Seaborn, have thrown wide the gates for us.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Yet we refuse to partake in it, all for the sake of so-called 'human dignity.' Is that not arrogance? Is that not irresponsible towards the future of humanity? Is that notâ€”
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Stop. 'Evolution,' 'arrogance'... I have no idea what the hell you're on about.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: *sigh* I understand your doubts. In truth, Anya had similar misgivings to my proposal at first.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: But as you now know, in the end she even snatched the pheromones from my hand to guide the Seaborn herself.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: If one is to take the reins of destiny for all humanity, then one must be suitably aware of the suffering and moral condemnation one is to shoulder. Does that not sound like the Anya you know?
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Lucilla glares at the old man. She considers denying what she has heard, but all the facts ring true.
You still haven't said what's going on with her remains.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Before she left, she promised me that even if the plan failed, she would bring back living Seaborn cells.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: I gave my all to retrieve her one remaining hand. What she promised me was still tightly in its grasp.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: As you know, there is no means of bringing it into the city. The dome does have entrances for cleaning robots, though, which should be exactly the size I need.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: All you need to do is put on a little show as a dome maintenance worker and make it past their checks.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Anya's last wish...
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: If this really is what she wanted... I just need to bring her home, right?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Tell me which reef you hid her... remains in.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: (Anya and her wish were hidden in the reefs close to the power station...)
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: You must steel your mind, Lucilla. Considering it's been more than twenty-four hours since the incident, your friend's remains will be unrecognizable.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Don't worry. I just want to see it for myself. Her last wish.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: You mentioned during the investigation that you once harbored fallen thoughts, too. But you've made the right choice by reporting Pappus to us.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: I just don't think calling the Seaborn to attack the city sounds like something she'd wish for.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Regardless, I still hope you'll reconsider our proposal. Pappus has gone into hiding. It'd be more efficient if you were able to lure him out.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: We discovered a human hand within marker range. We're requesting an analysis from the technicians.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: The Sea Patroller hands over a transparent vessel. A pale, waterlogged, and bloated arm rests within.
Lucilla does not lift her gaze from it.
Are you alright?
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: She is not. Her mind feels like it is tearing apart at the seams, blocking out all rationality. Lucilla stands rigid as a corpse herself, before she collects herself enough to speak.
That's her hand, alright. We were always looking over the same control panel, tapping it now and then... I'd recognize her nails anywhere.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Do you know what's in her hand?
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Under the careful ministrations of the technician, a small, sealed jar for storing liquids is prised out from the hand's grasp.
(That's...!)
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: (So that's what it was. I get it now. This little jar you were holding onto so tightly. This is your wish, Anya.)
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: ...You know, I've just made up my mind. I'll help you. I'll help you guys get Pappus out in the open.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Five minutes until the meeting, Lucilla. Pappus could come out at any time. Stay close to the building. You're deviating from the route, and it'll be hard for us to show up promptly if anything happens.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Lucilla?
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: No response. Everyone, prepare for non-compliance from her.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Pappus has appeared.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Come with me, quick. The Sea Patrol knows about our plan. I'll help you escape.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: What? I need more detailsâ€”
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: There's no time! Just run already!
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: I guess we were right to be worried.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Attention, all units. Lucilla is currently aiding a Church of the Deep cultist escape.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: She is to be regarded as an additional suspect in our pursuit.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Her actions are proof enough. She intends to betray Ã†gir.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: This is... the city's water circulation system?
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: The pipes are interlinked with the dome, so they fall under my purview as well. I've closed all the sluice gates that I can; should buy us some time.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: This isn't what we discussed, Lucilla.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Dome monitoring's more strict than usual while the city's moving. The inlets are the only places that don't get extra scrutiny. Thing is, one of us needs to squeeze in to intercept the thing.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Wait, let me consider this.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Why, worried about the risk? As Anya's esteemed teacher, surely you're as brave as she was?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: With this sudden turn of affairs, can I still trust you, Lucilla?
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: We don't need to trust each other. You want your thing, I want to fulfill Anya's last wish. That's all.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Pappus looks Lucilla in the eyes and ponders for a brief moment.
If she had intended to betray him, she wouldn't be helping him flee. That would be ridiculously inefficient. He loosens up.
When we met yesterday, your eyes were clouded with hesitation. But now, that's all cleared. I'm glad to see you make the right choice.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Sure, but we're short on time. You need to get into the pipe, now.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Now? But I'm not wearing any protective equipment.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Sorry, what was that? Anya grabbed the attractant pheromones from your hand without the slightest hesitation, and you're worried about a little thing like that?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Quick, I've already opened the feeder gate! I can't keep it open for long, so just get in already!
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: But this isâ€”!
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Right as Pappus senses that something is off, a push to his back sends him tumbling straight into the pipe.
Lucilla closes the sewage gate. She looks into the air, her hands trembling slightly as they grasp the gate handle.
But after a moment, she snaps out of it, and smiles.
Gah! This stench! This isn't sewage, is it?!
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Where are you, Lucilla?
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Did you find anything down there?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: The flow's too strong and the walls are slippery! I-I can't keep my balance! AHH!
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: You just gotta keep at it. Feel around in the water. This is for the sake of the city's future, remember?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Why is there sewage in the city's water inlet pipes? Urp! Pah! Bluerghh...
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Oops, I forgot to mention, those are actually the inner circulatory pipes. They handle residue from algae fermentation. The water inlet pipes are incredibly important; no way they'd let you in.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: You tricked me, Lucilla! Why did you-! *vomits* Urgh... *cough* *cough*!
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: ...Open the gate. Let me out.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Talk to me about Anya. What was the last thing she said to you?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Geh... *cough*! How do you expect me to talk down here? I can't even breathe...
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Answer me, or we'll be here all day.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: I've already told you everything you needed.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Fine, if you really must knowâ€” Urgh! *cough* *cough*! After the Seaborn took over the power station, I realized this was my only chance. I had to lure them over, before the city had evacuated too far away.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: I was close to the power station before I noticed that Anya had rushed over as well. In her haste to head out to sea, she'd had no time to recharge her pod's power to full, something I only learned afterwards.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: We were right next to the station, and the Seaborn had already spotted us. We had no time to discuss things. We had to, at the very least, successfully release the pheromones and lure them to the city.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: And so, she snatched the pheromones from my hand and promised she would complete our mission, bidding me return to the city. I got into my own pod. Someone had to perform the backup plan, after all.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Her pod, however, ran out of power and was caught by the Seaborn. The last thing I heard through the comms was her saying, over and over again, that she would hold it tight. *cough* *cough* *cough*! Gehâ€”
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Hold what tight?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: She could only have meant the live Seaborn samples. Though we'd had significant disagreement over the backup plan I suggested, in that moment, we had a tacit understanding.
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: I already asked the Sea Patrol to find her remains.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: ...You told on me to the Sea Patrol? Lucilla, do... do you really understand Anya?
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Heh. Right. You were always hiding away in the dome, shying away from the Seaborn, looking out into pure waters. How could you understand what she felt? What I felt?
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: I saw what she held in her hand. The thing she 'held tight' even as the Seaborn tore her apart and devoured her.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: You took what Anya sacrificed her life forâ€”
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: It was an unopened vial of attractant pheromones, Pappus.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Tell me, Anya. Is the sea out there really that terrifying?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: I... I work in the spot closest to the sea every day, but I've never seen them before.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: I only ever see the unending streams of legionnaires heading out, and you and your mentor doing your best to restore the ocean's ecology.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Sometimes, I think... What's the frontline really like? What price did you pay for the peace I see inside the dome?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Idiot.
attributes.name: Anya

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: You don't need to know. It's... It's better if you don't.
attributes.name: Anya

attributes.content: Anya's eyes widen slightly as she points out into the ocean. Lucilla follows her finger, and what she sees causes her breath to catch in her throat.
Magma from the volcano is seeping out of the seafloor below the city, its radiance illuminating the reefs and organisms within them.
A seabed sunset. Lucky! Would've missed it if I came over late.
attributes.name: Anya

attributes.content: Lucilla can't help but lean over and look her in the eye. Anya's joy-filled gaze reflects the ocean they both so dearly love. The home of the Ã†gir.
'The Hopeful Ones.' Don't know why, but that phrase suddenly popped into my head... Oh, right! It's the name of the art exhibition coming up soon. When's it open...
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Ah, it's in two days!
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Then I guess we know what we're doing after work that day? Let's go check out this 'Hopeful Ones' thing.
attributes.name: Anya

attributes.content: I knew she never intended to release those pheromones. She would never lead the Seaborn to the city.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: And you... You stupid, cowardly...
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Lucilla, you know perfectly well that Milliarium could withstand an attack from this wave of Seaborn, so why would it retreat?
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Because it's not retreating. It's moving towards dry land. Ã†gir is set to engage in another pointless struggleâ€”
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Oh, great, more of this nonsense!
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Let me conclude this little speech of yours for you: Wanting to escape the Seaborn? A pointless struggle. Fighting against them? Also a pointless struggle.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Was Anya saving your ass also a pointless struggle to you?! Hah! Sounds like I really did do the right thing!
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Just stop this. Even if you do drown me here, it won't prove either of us right, and it'll be of no benefit for the future...
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Do... Do you really intend to go through with this, Lucilla?
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Very well. If that is the future you believe inâ€”
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Pappus's voice is cut off by a furious slam on the other side of the call.
We've found Lucilla by an entry to the city's inner circulatory pipes. No sign of Pappus.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: Teams two and three, search for Pappus. Team one, with me!
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Don't move, Lucilla.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Huh, this is the first time I've ever been pointed at like this.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Where's Pappus?
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Don't know. I'm not the head of the Institute of Incubation, so don't bother asking me about missing children, okay?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: He's an important lead. He can't die yet. He's in the pipes, right? Where exactly?
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Seems you Sea Patrollers also love talking to yourselves and not listening.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: There's a rage in you. I've seen it plenty of times in these sorts of cases. A fury in the eyes of the victim's friends and family that cannot be quenched.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: You don't have much time left. Five minutes have passed since you arrived here. If he truly is somewhere in the pipes, he should be reaching his limits about now.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Don't you think that drowning in a sewage pipe is a fitting way for him to go?
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Tell us where he is, now.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Suspect Pappus has been found! First aid robot requested!
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: In the distance, Pappus, reeking from head to toe, lies flat on the ground. Deathly pale and motionless.
Let me see. He's...
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: *cough*...
attributes.name: Pappus

attributes.content: Still aliveâ€”
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Luckily the pipe was not closed here; it let some fresh air inside. Nearly unconscious by the time we found him, but he was still trying to crawl out of there.
attributes.name: Sea Patroller

attributes.content: Upon hearing that the pipe was left open, the Sea Patrol captain realizes something. He turns to Lucilla. A bitter, self-mocking smile flashes across her face, tears swelling up in her eyes.
Guess I couldn't do it after all. I couldn't go against her final wish. The one she sacrificed her life to save... Hmph.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Once again, you made the right choice. I hope it came from the heart.
attributes.name: Sea Patrol Captain

attributes.content: Relax. Sorry to say, but there's no fallen dome maintenance worker for you to execute here.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: For causing you guys so much trouble, I'll accept whatever punishment you see fit. Keep it quick, though. I have an exhibition to visit later.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Even though the one I wanted to go with isn't here anymore, I promised her I'd go and see them. The ones who hold onto hope.
attributes.name: Lucilla

attributes.content: Lucilla walks towards the Sea Patrol ship, her relief clear on her face, and a spring in her step. She looks down at her hand, clasped as though it is being held by a familiar grasp.
